transfer.description: Transfers `_value` amount of tokens to address `_to`.

transferFrom.description: Transfers `_value` amount of tokens from address `_from` to address `_to`.

approve.description: Allows `_spender` to withdraw `_value` amount of tokens from the caller's account.

increaseApproval.description: Increases the allowance of `_spender` by `_addedValue` tokens.

decreaseApproval.description: Decreases the allowance of `_spender` by `_subtractedValue` tokens.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimals used by the token.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of tokens.

balanceOf.description: Returns the token balance of address `_owner`.

allowance.description: Returns the remaining number of tokens that `_spender` is allowed to spend from `_owner`.

paused.description: Returns whether the contract is paused.

owner.description: Returns the current owner of the contract.

transferOwnership.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new address.

constructor.description: Initializes the contract with the given total token amount.

Pause.description: Emitted when the contract is paused.

Unpause.description: Emitted when the contract is unpaused.

Approval.description: Emitted when an approval is made.
